sentences.en: a hike in the woods
sentences.cn: 林间远足

sentences.en: A party dress is inappropriate for a hike.
sentences.cn: 社交聚会礼服不适合徒步旅行时穿.

sentences.en: After the hike to the river the soldiers camped for the night.
sentences.cn: 士兵们步行到达那条河后露营过夜.

sentences.en: Did you cover much ground on the hike?
sentences.cn: 你们徒步走了很多路 吗 ?

sentences.en: Early in the morning, hikers pack everything that they will need for the day's hike.
sentences.cn: 一大早，徒步旅行者们把当天旅行所需的一切都装进包里。

sentences.en: He wants to hike round the world.
sentences.cn: 他打算徒步旅行环游世界一周。

sentences.en: Hike up your socks; they are falling down.
sentences.cn: 你的袜子快掉下去了, 向上提提.

sentences.en: His dream is to hike the Appalachian Trail.
sentences.cn: 他的梦想是在阿巴拉契亚山道上徒步旅行。

sentences.en: I don't care to go on a hike.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢徒步旅行.

sentences.en: I found it when I got lost once on a community hike.
sentences.cn: 有次我集体野游走丢了,就发现了这儿.

sentences.en: It's a hell of a hike from Sydney to Perth.
sentences.cn: 从悉尼到珀斯的徒步旅行简直苦死了.

sentences.en: My shirt will hike up if I don't wear a belt.
sentences.cn: 如果我不扎腰带,衬衣就向上滑.

sentences.en: The boys have gone on a long hike with the Boy Scouts.
sentences.cn: 男孩们已经随童子军长途徒步旅行去了.

sentences.en: The union demands a 7％ wage hike.
sentences.cn: 工会要求提高工资7%.

sentences.en: They had an eighty-mile journey and decided to hitch-hike.
sentences.cn: 他们要走80英里的路程，最后决定搭便车。

sentences.en: They had lost their way on a community hike somewhere in Kent.
sentences.cn: 有次去肯特参加集体野游,他们走丢了.

sentences.en: They went on a ten-mile hike through the forest.
sentences.cn: 他们做了一次穿越森林的十英里徒步旅行。

sentences.en: You can organize a picnic in the park, a group hike or bike ride, or meet up with friends for one of those free local events.
sentences.cn: 你可以组织在公园野餐一群徒步旅行或者骑自行车或者和朋友会面为其中的一个免费本地事件。

sentences.en: You could hike through the Fish River Canyon – it's entirely up to you.
sentences.cn: 你可以远足穿越菲什干河大峡谷–这全由你自己决定。

sentences.en: You could hike through the Fish River Canyon.
sentences.cn: 你可以徒步穿越鱼河峡谷。
